body:
FWIW I have a one-line change that makes the slow path about 30% faster on Dmitry's number:

```
name                      old time/op  new time/op  delta
AppendFloat/Slowpath64-4  68.2µs ± 0%  49.2µs ± 0%  -27.88%  (p=0.000 n=16+13)
```

It doesn't fix the problem but it's better than nothing I guess:

https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/30099
